column1: Counsel:       Hafeel Farisz with Sanjeewa Kodithuwakku for the Accused-Appellant
Wasantha Perera DSG  for the  Respondents
The  Accused-Appellant  (hereinafter  referred  to  as  "the  Accused")  was  indicted
before  the  High  Court  of  Colombo  for  the  possession  of  4.69  grams  of  heroin

in  violation  of  Section  54(a)  of  the  Poisons,  Opium  and

column1: Dangerous Drugs Ordinance, as amended by Act No. 13 of 1984.
